thread.title: Tiffany Trump Has Responded to Whoopi Goldberg’s Offer to Sit With Her at Fashion Week
thread.title_full: Tiffany Trump Has Responded to Whoopi Goldberg’s Offer to Sit With Her at Fashion Week

author: Dana Eisenberg
title: Tiffany Trump Has Responded to Whoopi Goldberg’s Offer to Sit With Her at Fashion Week

organizations.name: fashion week tiffany trump has responded

text:
Tiffany Trump Has Responded to Whoopi Goldberg’s Offer to Sit With Her at Fashion Week by Dana Eisenberg | 4:54 pm, February 16th, 2017 
Yesterday on The View , Whoopi Goldberg talked about the fact that editors from Elle magazine moved her seats during a show at New York Fashion Week so that they wouldn’t have to sit next to first daughter Tiffany Trump . Photo evidence emerged on social media of Trump sitting alone at the show. 
Goldberg said “Tiffany, I’m supposed to go to a couple more shows, I don’t know what’s gonna happen, but I’m coming to sit with you because nobody is talking politics. You’re looking at fashion. She doesn’t want to talk about her dad.” 
“I’ve been there, where people say we’re not going to sit next to you,” she said. 
Trump tweeted a reply to Goldberg, thanking her and saying she’d “love to” sit with her. Thank you @WhoopiGoldberg I’d love to sit with you too! 😊 
— Tiffany Ariana Trump (@TiffanyATrump) February 15, 2017 
[featured image via screen grab]
